Uses of Class
dstm2.manager.BaseManager

  • Packages that use BaseManager 
    Package Description
    dstm2.manager  

    • Uses of BaseManager in dstm2.manager

      Subclasses of BaseManager in dstm2.manager 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AggressiveManager
      The Chuck Norris contention manager: always abort other transaction.
      class  BackoffManager
      Contention manager employing simple exponential backoff.
      class  EruptionManager
      Resolves conflicts by increasing pressure on the transactions that a blocked transaction is waiting on, eventually causing them to erupt through to completion.
      class  GreedyManager
      Tries to keep a maximal independent set running.
      class  KarmaManager
      Uses "karmic debt management" to resolve conflicts.
      class  KindergartenManager
      Transactions take turns playing with blocks.
      class  PriorityManager
      Older transaction always wins.
